edge: Akshay Kumar portrays the character of Samrat Prithviraj Chauhan in the movie.
In the movie, Varun Buddhadev plays the role of a young version of Samrat Prithviraj Chauhan, nicknamed 'Prithvi'.
Manushi Chhillar is depicted as Sanyogita in the movie.
Sanjay Dutt's character in the movie is called Kaka Kanha.
In the movie, Chand Bardai is played by Sonu Sood.
Manav Vij portrays Muhammad Ghori in the movie.
In the movie, Ashutosh Rana's character is named Jayachandra.
In the movie, Sakshi Tanwar's character is identified as Jayachandra's wife.
The character Kannauj Purohit in the movie is portrayed by Lalit Tiwari.
In the movie, Govind Pandey's character is called Jayachandra's Senapati.
In the movie, Manoj Joshi plays the role of a wealthy merchant.
In the movie, Arun Bali's character is named Arnoraja.
Thakurbaba, Prithviraj's adviser in the movie, is played by Rajendra Gupta.
In the movie, Vikas Shrivastav plays the role of Jayachandra's guard.
The movie portrays Sahidur Rahaman as Qutb-ud-din Aibak.

node_2: a general of samrat prithviraj's army
edge: In the movie, Kranti Prakash Jha is depicted as a general of Samrat Prithviraj's army.
In the movie, Baluk Rai is played by Kamaljeet Rana.
